title: Hi sir I am amit i am a youtuber i have 50 k subscribers and i would like to review your product
content:
Hi sir
I am amit i am a youtuber i have 50 k subscribers and i would like to review your produt and i will also give feedback on the following product i am attached to pixal mobiles because they are easy to use and best of all. I will be waiting for your reply. 

Your respectivly 
Amit
